name: Jeremy Mayfield
text: I would come here again and again! If anyone visits ask for Mateo! Great one on one instruction. The prices were reasonable and the service was great!

name: MyFathers TwoAcres
text: This was a lot of fun. Went for the first time last night at a different place and came to this place tonight.  This place had a lot more lanes to chunk axes down but it also had a lot more noise with the go cart speedway inside. They looked fun as well but we just did the axe throw. Little bit on the expensive side of things.  Still had a great time. Learned more about throwing and some more games to play.

name: Cody LeBouef
text: Had a very nice time with the family racing and then throwing axes. Mateo was our coach, and he was very friendly and informative! Great experience overall

name: Mariah Carrie
text: Very fun experience. Went on a couple date night! Zane was an excellent coach ! I will definitely go back again ! :)

name: Mike Patterson
text: We went for a Father’s Day outing not knowing what to expect. It was so much fun!! Everyone there was so nice and helpful and our coach Shawn was the best instructor!! He was like part of the family by the time we left. We will definitely be back!!

name: Josh Head
text: I can’t say enough positive things about this place. We had a blast here and our throwing instructor Kyle was the best! He was a awesome guy that put up with six of us and to say he was great is an understatement. I’m definitely coming back here with my family.

name: Anna Volz
text: We celebrated my birthday with Axe throwing at the Autobahn Speedway. Due to a glitch with their wood, it took them a lot longer to get us back there than anticipated, but it was SO worth it! Our master axe thrower, Shawn, made the entire night fun! He was a great instructor and helped us have a truly memorable experience!

name: Emily Johnson-Peyton
text: Autobahn is a great place. Myself and 3 others enjoyed our axe throwing experience so much, and they also cart raced which they said they really enjoyed. We are not from Birmingham we were just visiting and we were very pleased with our visit. Sadly I can't remember our coaches for axe throwing but they were both great and gave us our space to enjoy ourselves. Sorry I can't remember their names but we came in on Sunday 9/1 if that helps. If we are ever in Bham again we will most certainly come back!

resp.text:
Thank you Emily! We enjoyed reading your review, we felt good knowing we provided you a wonderful experience with the axe throwing and the cart racing! Thank you for your kind words to our coaches, everyone works hard at giving customers like yourself the best time!

Yes, if you're ever in Birmingham again, our doors are wide open for you! Thank you for the FIVE STAR REVIEW!!

Courtney Jones
Customer Service

name: Joe Gerard
text: Insanely nice owner. I came here for a track day and the man was very kind, immediately greeting us and then once everyone was there, him and his wife introduced us all to the track and cooked a home cooked meal for us all for lunch, and really love that they made everyone instantly feel like family. Also love the ducks they have there.

name: Pete Panaia
text: I love this place! It just keeps getting better and better! The owner (Ken) is a great guy! The staff there is awesome!

name: Anthony Beasley
text: Absolutely one of the best tracks I've been to. Last weekend every month $150 gets you all day to slide with pride. They also offer bike racing and kart racing.

name: Andrew O.
text:
Follow me on Instagram: a.leestudios

Best track I've been.

Ken is the man.

name: Jay Reed (JargonJC)
text:
A wonderful experience for any Motorhead. The track has several tight turns that will test your car and it does not matter what kind of car you have. I have a Volvo wagon and I kept up with my friend and their Miata.

Every third Sunday of the month is when they have open track days and the cost is $75 for all day access. The owner even cooked us lunch on a grill.

name: cody king
text: Went as just a spectator, pulled my buddies car for him had a blast spite the heat. 10/10 recommend.

name: Elsea’s World
text: I am proud to call Midpond my home track. Ken works extremely hard to keep the landscape perfect and it shows. Track is nice and tight, makes for great drifting!

name: Jeremy Lester
text: Hands down the most inviting atmosphere of any track. Owner in incredibly nice and accommodating. Always making improvements and conscious of making the track safe for drivers and cars. Will definitely be making a trip back down in the future the whole way from PA!

name: David Shaddix
text: Raw, Ridiculous,  Ripping Fun!

name: Edward Lee
text: Awesome race track. Ken, the owner, is awesome. He let us camp anywhere on his racetrack and even let us use his fire pit to cook and keep warm. I'll be back soon for more drift events. Thanks Ken!

name: James Drumheller
text: Love this place

name: Christopher Lovett
text: Awesome place great people awesome staff.

name: Josh Halterman
text: Absolutely fantastic. Great track, tons of seat time, and tons of fun. Ken, the owner, is an awesome guy. Definitely coming back!

name: Cory Grimm
text: This is an oasis in the desert! The only place that runs minimoto for hours. The track surface adds a certain ... challenge to making a fast lap, but Midpond is a great track! The owner is awesome and has a true passion for motorsports. If you get a chance to come to Midpond in a car or on a motorcycle, take it!

name: Jason Dewald
text: Small, tight track. Low fees, maximum seat time, tons of fun!

name: Da Fink
text: Kicking it sideways

name: John Mace
text: Fantastic time and great people!

name: Bud Yeddi
text: I had SO MUCH FUN!! Words cannot describe ❤

name: Louis “ig: Ceo_of_Low” Steverson
text: Great pleace with Great people!

name: Sebastien (350z_zena)
text: Best place to learn how to drift

name: James Drumheller
text: Love this place

name: Michael Upton
text: Had along of fun people really nice

name: Robert Hough
text: Best place to drift in this area.

name: Tyler Durham
text: A great racing experience

name: PHATSAMURAI1
text: Best there is

name: Noah Washington
text: Ok

name: cltcnc
text: Awesome track

name: William Kania
text: Best experience ever
